body:
### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.6.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "e0dbd18f1d7a48a4b98e97dbdc45dfc7f0b1cf902afe86c442614db17f560611",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/5.6.0/rules_ios.5.6.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Propagate clang module in SwiftInfo for objc-only frameworks by @jschear in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/939
* Remove Luis Padron from BCR metadata by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/941
* Remove unused rules_swift repos by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/942


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.5.1...5.6.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.5.1", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

```bzl
)
```

## What's Changed
* Handle multiple alwayslink error in objc_library by @ssaradp in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/938

## What's Changed
* Remove references to objc_provider and remove force_load_direct_deps to support rules_apple > 3.15.0 by @ssarad in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/934


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.4.0...5.5.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.4.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

## What's Changed
* Revert "Avoid calling to_list in _get_cc_info_linker_inputs for performance (#930) by @amorde in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/932
* Drop support for Bazel 6 by @ssarad in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/935
* Remove use of struct.to_json() by @nataliejameson in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/936

## New Contributors
* @ssarad made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/935
* @nataliejameson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/936

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.3.0...5.4.0

## What's Changed
* Allow library tool resource handling to be disabled by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/928
* Avoid calling to_list in _get_cc_info_linker_inputs for performance by @amorde in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/930

## What's Changed
* Fix new PR cancel previous PR's workflow by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/918
* Merge clang/swift modules into one `direct_module` in SwiftInfo for a framework by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/916
* Relanding of `Add swift.experimental_rules_swift_package_manager flag` back to master branch by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/922
* Remove swift info provider creation inside hmap rule by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/919
* Select device_families by platform_type in precompiled_apple_resource_bundle by @vakhidbetrakhmadov in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/924
* Fix unit test attr forwarding by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/927

## New Contributors
* @vakhidbetrakhmadov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/924

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.1.0...5.2.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.1.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

```bzl
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",

protobuf_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* Revert "Add headers to `headermap` action `inputs`" by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/893
* Fix apple_library rule not working in sandbox when do `SwiftCompile` in mixed sources by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/894
* Add sandbox mode to CI testing matrix by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/895
* Avoid umbrella header crash error in remote compilation when no default umbrella header generated by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/897
* Remove extended modulemap from swiftc_inputs by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/900
* Add CI tests for latest rules_swift and rules_apple by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/899
* Fix rules_swift 2 compatibility issues by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/903
* Fix import_middleman broken with Bazel 7 + sandbox mode by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/910
* Ensures the determinism of vfsoverlay file by @congt in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/912


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.0.0...5.1.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.0.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "d1cc852aa9e989c12b802e04cb66dfe51418153c781d6073bb30e82284866865",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/5.0.0/rules_ios.5.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Remove support for xcodeproj rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/883
* CI: Bazel 7 tests use Build without the Bytes by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/886
* Add headers to `headermap` action `inputs` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/888
* Add `direct_public_headers` to CcInfo `compilation_context` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/889
* Remove usage of predeclared outputs from rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/891
* Remove `_headermap_builder` from `framework.bzl` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/890
* Handle `swift.swift_disable_import_underlying_module` in `features` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/892


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.8.2...5.0.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "4.8.2", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

## What's Changed
* Add support for `extension_safe` attr by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/876
* Bazel 7: Set framework_includes in import_middleman by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/877


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.6.0...4.7.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "4.6.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

## What's Changed
* Add support for apple platform command line options by @karim-alweheshy in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/816
* Update CI for latest actions and to use matrix by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/841
* Fix duplicate symbols for test rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/844
* Update: use `use_cpp_toolchain` for toolchains by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/845
* Remove split_transition_rule_attrs to simplify transition_support by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/846
* Update toolchains support for latest rules_apple and transitions by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/848
* Update transition support by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/847
* Allow consumers to set always_include_developer_search_paths in swift_library by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/852
* Forward package_name to swift_library part of apple_library by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/853
* Safer objc_provider assignment in apple_framework_packaging by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/855


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.1.0...4.2.0

```bzl
)

protobuf_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* Fix pkg_resources module not found in CI by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/804
* Ignore MODULE.bazel.lock by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/806
* Support Swift Macro by @qyang-nj in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/805


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/3.1.2...3.1.3

## What's Changed
* Add docs on BCR publishing by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/792
* Allow Bazel 6 users to explicitly opt-in to rules_apple 2.x by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/793
* Remove missing `output_discriminator` attribute usage by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/796
* Conditionally handle `--apple_compiler` & `--apple_grte_top` by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/798
* Decouple CI & remote cache config by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/799
* Update precompiled_apple_resource_bundle to not include executable_name by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/801


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/3.1.0...3.1.1

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "3.1.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

```bzl
swift_rules_dependencies()

load(

)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Enable `--experimental_strict_conflict_checks` by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/671
* Use remote cache when building in xcodeproj on CI by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/788
* Pre-boot simulator for xcodebuild usage by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/789
* Remove dependency on rules_python by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/790
* [Xcode 15] Fix libtool version check by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/791


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/3.0.1...3.1.0
